name: Tenshi Adventure
description:
Join Tenshi on his journey jumping over sushi, dodging flying penguins, navigating a maze and much more on this short collection of 2D minigames!

Check us out on 16bite.com!

Credits:

- Original idea by: Celia Xiaoju Fernandez Guzman

- Programmed by: Leo Humphreys Newman

- Art by: Hector Jimenez Alvarez

- Written by: Nicolas Urias Sanchez

- Social media managed by: Sergio Catalan Elias
